程序包 org.elassandra.cluster.routing

类 AbstractSearchStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elassandra.cluster.routing.AbstractSearchStrategy
  • 直接已知子类:
    PrimaryFirstSearchStrategy, RandomSearchStrategy
    public abstract class AbstractSearchStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
    Only support Murmur3 Long Token. SearchStrategy is per index SearchStrategy.Router is updated each time node join/leave/start/stop the cluster. SearchStrategy.Router.Route is per query route.
